title: Companies (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 14 of 2024) shall come into operation.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Employment (Collective Redundancies
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Employment (Collective Redundancies 
and Miscellaneous Provisions) and Companies (Amendment) Act 2024 
(Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited employment (collective redundancy miscellaneous provisions) company (amendment) act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: Companies (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 14 of 2024) shall come into operation.
heading: 2. The 1st day of July 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of July 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
Employment (Collective Redundancies and Miscellaneous Provisions) and 
Companies (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 14 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 June, 2024. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st June, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [303] 3

ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
